name: A Silent Dream of a Star
name_original: A Silent Dream of a Star
description:
A Silent Dream of a Star is a really short bittersweet love story about a boy who found love in a girl he found.

It's a story of how they got to know each other and how a beautiful curse can break your heart.

The game was just a fun project and is nothing special. It's about 10min of gameplay. It's no one way a high quality game, but I hope my little story would be enjoyable even a bit :>

I heard that mac seems to have problems with opening the game. I don't own Mac so it's hard for the to check why exactly. I will put the file in here and if someone finds the way around it please notify me 

I'm sorry for the inconvenience
